title: Game crashes after Nvidia GeForce Experience optimisation
body:
I'm getting severe game crashing every few minutes which seems to be due to a graphical issue. I think I have narrowed it down to GeForce experience 
"optimisation" of my game settings which has resulted in severe instability. Strangely GeForce Experience doesn't seem to change any settings from what I had already (very high preset).

Repatching/corrupted file repair won't fix it but if I manually reset graphics settings it goes away.

My LOL installation is not on the C drive which might be part of the problem??

This bug has resulted in me being put in a low priority queue so thanks Nvidia... Please could Riot get rid of the waits?

replies.body:
Nvidia experience is malware, ditch that shit.

Software that modifies settings without the game being involved has a pretty low chance of producing good or stable results. It may be setting corrupt data, impossible values, or just really bad combinations.
